offers.terms_and_conditions:
Round the year discount - ₹1,000 Off on Domestic Flights

You have a new best friend. Every time you use your Yatra SBI Credit Card, a number of benefits come your way, ranging from reward points to great discounts at Yatra.com. Get your credit card today! 

Here is how the offer works:

Vouchers

As soon as you enroll with this travel card, you get Yatra.com vouchers worth ₹8,250.

  • 2 vouchers worth Rs500 each for Domestic Travel
  • 2 vouchers worth Rs1,000 each for International Travel
  • 1 voucher worth ₹750 for Hotel Bookings
  • 1 voucher worth Rs1,500 for Domestic Holidays
  • 1 voucher worth ₹3,000 for International Holidays

Offer with Yatra
Promo code : TRAVEL

  • ₹1,000 Off on Domestic Flight booking with min. booking amount of ₹5,000
  • ₹4,000 Off on International Flight booking with min. booking amount of ₹40,000
  • Flat 20% Off (Max ₹2,000) on Domestic Hotel booking with min. booking amount of ₹3,000
  • A customer can use the promo code 6 times during a single calendar year.
  • The offer can be used on any of the 3 products in any combination i.e. 2 times on domestic flights, 2 times on international flights and so on.

Reward points

Every time you use your card, you get exciting reward points.

  • 6 Reward Points on every ₹100 spent on Departmental Stores, Groceries, Dining, Movies, Entertainment and International spends.
  • 1 Reward Point on every ₹100 spent on all other categories.
  • Reward Points redeemable for Yatra vouchers (1 Reward Point = 25 Paisa)

Other benefits

  • Fuel Benefits - 1% Fuel Surcharge Waiver across all petrol pumps. Maximum surcharge waiver of ₹100 monthly, per card account. Transactions between ₹500 and ₹3,000.
  • Complimentary Air Accidental - ₹50 Lakhs Air Accidental Cover for Primary cardholder when ticket is booked on Yatra using Yatra SBI Card
  • Anniversary Benefits - Get annual membership fee reversal from second year on annual spends of ₹1,00,000 in the previous year

offers.title: Domestic Flights
offers.description: Starts from just ₹54449
offers.terms_and_conditions:
For passengers travelling to India:

  • After completing web check-in on the airline's website, all passengers should submit the self-declaration form on the online portal (www.newdelhiairport.in) at least 72 hours before the scheduled travel.
  • Passengers should also give an undertaking on the portal that they would undergo mandatory quarantine for 14 days i.e. 7 days paid institutional quarantine at their own cost, followed by 7 days isolation at home with self-monitoring of health.
  • Home quarantine may be permitted for 14 days only for compelling reasons such as pregnancy, death in family, serious illness, and for parent(s) with children aging 10 years or below.
  • If passengers wish to seek such exemption from the same, they are required to apply to the online portal (www.newdelhiairport.in) at least 72 hours before boarding.
  • Passengers may also seek exemption from institutional quarantine by submitting a negative RT-PCR test report on arrival. This test should have been conducted within 96 hours prior to the journey and should be uploaded on the portal as well.
  • If the passenger has a valid negative RT-PCR test report conducted within 96 hours, followed by a self-declaration form filled/submitted within 72 hours prior to their journey, he/she will be allowed to exit the state government triage area to take the onward domestic flight.
  • All passengers from Dubai are also required to register on the Embassy/Consulate website www.cgidubai.gov.in/covid_register before departure, as mandated by the Consulate General of India, Dubai. This is in addition to the declaration mentioned above.

For passengers travelling outside India:

  • Web check-in for international travel opens 96 hours prior to departure.
  • Please find the destination-wise travel advisory and protocols that any entering passenger must follow. You are strongly advised to follow the guidelines and travel only if you are eligible to enter the destination, as per the aforementioned protocols.
  • Passengers are required to provide their travel details on https://www.gov.uk/provide-journey-contact-details-beforetravel-uk.
  • All passengers arriving in UK will be required fill a "Contact Locator Form" and self-isolate for 14 days. Passengers can be contacted regularly throughout this period to ensure compliance by the concerned authorities. For details refer:
    https://www.gov.uk/government/news/home-secretary-announces-new-public-health-measures-for-all-uk-arrivals
    https://www.gov.uk/uk-border-control

Travelers are advised to check official websites of relevant authorities and local government agencies for the latest Developments on travel restrictions.

Also travelers need to check at the originating station to ensure that their travel is not affected prior to commencement of journey.

Terms and Conditions

  • The offer is valid for online bookings on Vistara only.
  • Seats are subject to availability.
  • This offer is valid on direct flights only.
  • Yatra Online Pvt. Ltd. reserves the right without prior notice to add, alter, modify, all or any of these terms and conditions.
  • The offer maybe replaced wholly or in part, by any other offer, whether similar or not and can be withdrawn altogether.
  • Any disputes arising out of this offer shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of competent
  • courts in Gurgaon, Haryana.
  • All other standard terms and conditions of Vistara and Yatra.com shall apply.

offers.offer_text: Avail 5% off on All Products
offers.title: 5% Off
offers.description: This coupon is applicable on All Products (On order-value of ₹2000+. On Payment via Axis Bank Credit/Debit Cards only. Only on Wednesday)
offers.terms_and_conditions:
1. What is the offer?

Get 5% Instant Discount with Axis Bank Credit and Debit Cards, on purchase of any product listed in the Amazon Pantry Store or Fresh Store or More Megastore or BigBazaar store. The Offer is valid on the following dates in September 2020 i.e. 9th, 16th, 23rd & 30th September.

2. How can I avail this offer?

Just go through the normal purchase process and checkout with the eligible products. On the payment page, please select your saved Axis Bank Card to pay.

3. What is the minimum transaction size for the offer?

As long as ₹2,000 is spent on the card for purchase of eligible products on each cart separately (Pantry, Fresh, More & BigBazaar), you will be eligible for the offer during respective check out.

4. What is the maximum discount that I can avail?

The maximum discount possible per Axis Bank Card across Amazon.in Site and App is ₹250/month on Credit Card and Debit Card. Example: a) Pantry cart value is ₹2000, max discount is Rs 100 b) Fresh cart value is ₹2000 and Pantry cart value is ₹4000 If Fresh cart is checked out first, discount on Fresh would be ₹100 and Pantry discount would be ₹150. If Pantry cart is checked out first then discount on Pantry would be 200 and Fresh would be ₹50. c) Pantry cart value is ₹1000 and Fresh cart value is ₹1000 irrespective of checkout sequence discount on both will be ₹0 as this transaction doesn’t meet the minimum transaction criteria of either carts.

5. Is discount applicable on debit and credit cards?

Yes, the discount is available on Axis Bank Credit and Debit Cards.

6. Can I avail discount on EMI?

Yes, the discount is applicable on Axis Bank Debit and Credit Card EMI.

7. I did not receive the discount. Why?

Please make sure you are using an eligible card, and have eligible Pantry and Fresh products worth ₹2,000 or more in each cart separately (Pantry and Fresh).

8. My payment failed while placing the order, will I be eligible for the offer?

If your payment failed while placing the order, Amazon.in gives you an option to revise your payment. If you revise your payment successfully within the offer duration, you will be eligible for the offer. For more information on revise payment, https://www.amazon.in/gp/help/customer/display.html/ref=nav_cs_help?ie=UTF8&nodeId=201467790%3e

Note: Offer not applicable on Infant Nutrition products.

  5.   6. The maximum discount provided under this Offer will not exceed INR 250 on debit and credit / per Card per month. Example: a) Pantry cart value is ₹2000, max discount is Rs 100 b) Fresh cart value is ₹2000 and Pantry cart value is ₹4000 If Fresh cart is checked out first, discount on Fresh would be ₹100 and Pantry discount would be ₹150. If Pantry cart is checked out first then discount on Pantry would be 200 and Fresh would be ₹50. c) Pantry cart value is ₹1000 and Fresh cart value is ₹1000 irrespective of checkout sequence discount on both will be ₹0 as this transaction doesn’t meet the minimum transaction criteria of either carts.
  7. The Offer is NOT applicable on payment made by customers using the 'Card on Delivery' payment option.
  8. The purchase of Product by Cardholders on equated monthly instalments (EMI) will also eligible for this Offer.
  9. This Offer will not be applicable if the Cardholder or the seller or Amazon cancel the order and/or the Cardholder returns the Product and, in such a case, participation in the Offer will be deemed withdrawn. In such a scenario, only the net amount paid by the Cardholder will be refunded. In other words, the instant discount will not be refunded. v10. Amazon and/or the Bank reserve the right to disqualify the Cardholder from the benefits of the Offer if any fraudulent activity is identified as being carried out for the purpose of availing the benefits under the said Offer or otherwise by use of the Card.

  11. Delinquent and over-limit Bank's credit card members will not qualify for this Offer.
  12. Cardholders are not bound in any way to participate in this Offer. Any participation is voluntary and the Offer is being made purely on a best effort basis.
  13. Nothing herein amounts to a commitment by the Bank or Amazon to conduct further, similar or other offers.

offers.terms_and_conditions:
Save on travel with Axis Bank cards

Make a flights and hotels booking on Yatra with your Axis Bank Cards and get 10X rewards point (max. 10,000/per month). This offer is available between July 10 - December 31, 2020. Hurry, make your bookings now!

Yatra Exclusive Offer With Axis Bank Cards

  • Get 10X rewards point ( Max 10,000/Per Month)on flights and hotels booking.
  • The offer is valid only on Axis Bank credit and Debit cards only.

  • There is no min. booking amount required to avail this offer.
  • This offer is valid only on online confirmed bookings.

Terms and Conditions

  • All purchases made by the customer at www.yatra.com shall be governed by the standard Terms and Conditions (subject to changes) of Yatra, which includes without limitation User Agreement, Privacy Policy or any other product/service related terms and conditions appearing on Yatra’s website www.yatra.com.
  • All disputes arising out of or in connection with this offer shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the court in Gurugram.

Terms and Conditions on Axis Bank Credit and Debit Cards

These terms and conditions (“Terms”) shall be applicable to the Credit & Debit Cardholders (as defined hereinafter) participating in the Offer (as defined hereinafter) who agrees to be bound by the same and shall regulate the provisions of the specified products and services provided by the Axis Bank (“Axis Bank”).
